name: Great Movie Quotes Quiz | Which Movie | 25 Questions

questions.text: 'There is nothing between us. There has never been anything between us. Just air.' -Gene Kelly
questions.explanation:
Singin' In The Rain.

	Spoken by Don Lockwood (Gene Kelly) to Lina Lamont (Jean Hagen).

questions.text: 'By the authority invested in me by Kaiser Wilhelm II, I pronounce you husband and wife. Proceed with the execution.' -Peter Bull
questions.explanation:
The African Queen & African Queen.

	Spoken by the Captain of the Louisa (Peter Bull) to Charlie Allnut (Humphrey Bogart) and Rose Sayer (Katharine Hepburn).

questions.text: 'You want me to produce your war?' -Dustin Hoffman
questions.explanation:
Wag The Dog.

	Spoken by Stanley Motss (Dustin Hoffman) to Conrad Bream (Robert De Niro).

questions.text: 'The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love, and be loved in return.' -Ewan McGregor
questions.explanation:
Moulin Rouge.

	Spoken by Christian (Ewan McGregor).

questions.text: 'If this is a crush, I don't think I could take it if the real thing ever happened.' -Ben Affleck
questions.explanation:
Chasing Amy.

	Spoken by Holden McNeil (Ben Affleck) to Alyssa Jones (Joey Lauren Adams).

questions.text: 'Feminine weaknesses and fainting spells are the direct result of our confining young girls to the house, bent over their needlework, and restrictive corsets.' -Susan Sarandon
questions.explanation:
Little Women.

	Spoken by Marmee March (Susan Sarandon.)

questions.text:
Ben Affleck - 'You wanna say something?'
Jason Lee - 'Yeah, about a million things, but I can't express myself monosyllabically for you to understand it all!'
questions.explanation:
Mallrats.

	Spoken by Shannon Hamilton (Ben Affleck) and Brodie Bruce (Jason Lee)

questions.text: 'You can break a man's skull. You can arrest him. You can throw him into a dungeon. But how do you fight an idea?' -Andre Morell
questions.explanation:
Ben-Hur.

	Spoken by Sextus (Andre Morell) to Messala (Stephen Boyd).

questions.text: 'He's right behind me, isn't he?' -Billy Crystal
questions.explanation:
City Slickers.

	Spoken by Mitch Robbins (Billy Crystal), referring to Curly (Jack Palance).

questions.text: 'Are you a master builder or a master butcher?' -Charlton Heston
questions.explanation:
The Ten Commandments.

	Spoken by Moses (Charlton Heston) to Baka (Vincent Price).

questions.text: 'Most women use more brains picking a horse in the third at Belmont than they do picking a husband.' -Lauren Bacall
options: How to Pick Up a Man
questions.explanation:
How To Marry A Millionnaire.

	Spoken by Schatze Paige (Lauren Bacall) to Tom Brookman (Cameron Mitchell).

questions.text: 'We're alike, me and Cat. A couple of poor nameless slobs.' -Audrey Hepburn
questions.explanation:
Breakfast At Tiffany's.

	Spoken by Holly Golightly (Audrey Hepburn) to Paul Varjak (George Peppard).

questions.text: 'Talking about music is like dancing about architecture.' -Angelina Jolie
questions.explanation:
Playing By Heart.

	Spoken by Joan (Angelina Jolie).

questions.text: 'Love is an illusion created by lawyer types like yourself to perpetuate another illusion called marriage to create the reality of divorce and then the illusionary need for divorce lawyers.' -Andrew McCarthy
questions.explanation:
St. Elmo's Fire

	Spoken by Kevin (Andrew McCarthy) to Kirbo (Emilio Estevez).

questions.text: 'The child I loved was gone, but I kept looking for her -- long after I had left my own childhood behind.' -Jeremy Irons
questions.explanation:
Lolita.

	Spoken by Humbert Humbert (Jeremy Irons).

questions.text: 'When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.' -Billy Crystal
questions.explanation:
When Harry Met Sally.

	Spoken by Harry Burns (Billy Crystal) to Sally Albright (Meg Ryan).

questions.text: 'When one woman strikes at the heart of another she seldom misses, and the wound is invariably fatal.' -Glenn Close
questions.explanation:
Dangerous Liaisons.

	Spoken by the Marquise de Merteuil (Glenn Close) to Vimconte de Valmont (John Malkovich).

questions.text: 'You're like the thief who isn't the least bit sorry he stole, but is terribly, terribly sorry he's going to jail.' -Clark Gable
questions.explanation:
Gone With The Wind.

	Spoken by Rhett Butler (Clark Gable) to Scarlett O'Hara (Vivien Leigh).

questions.text:
Bruce Willis - 'Where did you put my wife?'
Susan Kellerman - 'She's dead, sir. They took her to the morgue.'
Bruce Willis - 'The morgue? She'll be FURIOUS!'
questions.explanation:
Death Becomes Her.

	Spoken by Ernest Menville (Bruce Willis) and the Doctor (Susan Kellerman).

questions.text: 'Come in, come in, sweet child. You mustn't lurk in doorways. It's rude.' -Pat Carroll
questions.explanation:
The Little Mermaid & Little Mermaid.

	Spoken by Ursula (Pat Carroll) to Ariel (Jodi Benson).

questions.text: 'I'm not lost. Somebody just moved my street.' -Piper Perabo
questions.explanation:
Coyote Ugly.

	Spoken by Violet Sanford (Piper Perabo) to Kevin O'Donnell (Adam Garcia).

questions.text: 'Let me tell you something my friend. Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.' -Morgan Freeman
questions.explanation:
The Shawshank Redemption & Shawshank Redemption.

	Spoken by Red (Morgan Freeman) to Andy Dufresne (Tim Robbins).

questions.text: 'I don't understand. All my life I've been waiting for someone and when I find her, she's... she's a fish.' -Tom Hanks
questions.explanation:
Splash!.

	Spoken by Allen Bauer (Tom Hanks) to Freddie Bauer (John Candy).

questions.text:
Paul Michael Glaser - 'Money is the world's curse.'
Topol - 'Well, then may the Lord smite me with it. And may I never recover!'
questions.explanation:
Fiddler On The Roof.

	Spoken by Perchik (Paul Michael Glaser) and Tevye (Topol).

questions.text: 'How can something so small make so much of something so disgusting?' -Tom Selleck
options: Three Men and a Little Lady
questions.explanation:
Three Men And A Baby.

	Spoken by Peter Mitchell (Tom Selleck).
